website_summaries.verdict: Lutron's Smart Bridge and related app work great, but the price is much too high for basic automated dimmer capabilities. If you plan to add other connected devices, its value will improve considerably.
pros: The $150 Lutron Smart Bridge transforms Caseta Wireless plug-in lamp dimmers, Pico remote controls, and Serena battery-powered window shades into Wi-Fi-enabled home automation products
The app is intuitively designed and more product integrations are on the way
cons: $150 plus another $55 for a single dimmer is a lot to spend for smart mood lighting
Belkin's $50 WeMo Switch may not have a dimmer feature, but it also doesn't need a separate hub to control a lamp remotely

customer_reviews.title: Great smart home bridge.
customer_reviews.text: I got this smart bridge to control my Lutron smart switches and connect to Apple Home app, Google assistant and my Nest Thermostat. All integrated and working with no issues and the install was nice and easy. It connected to my WiFi right off and the smart switches after following the instructions. And I said that was easy lol, now I control my lights, Nest Thermostat from the comfort of my lazy chair lol. The WiFi has not dropped at all so far and I am happy with the Lutron product line and hope they last for years
customer_reviews.author: ernie

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Device. Highly Recommend.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible device. It manages my lights as well as my Honeywell thermostat (which isn’t normally Alexa capable). Integration to Alexa was a snap. This has the capacity to integrate a ton of non-Lutron products. Highly recommended product.
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: Love having ability to control lights from ANYWERE IN THE WORLD!
customer_reviews.text: We were putting new lights in our kitchen and our electrician suggested we consider Lutron Caseta. We purchased and installed. Very easy to install bridge, download app to phone and instant control. We love having the ability and ease to turn on and off. Love when we are coming home from a restaurant at night and on the way turn on the lights, so nice!! Highly Recommend, Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hub for my Lutron Caseta dimmers
customer_reviews.text: Excellent hub for my Lutron Caseta dimmers. I did try the Wink Hub but the delay is horrible, almost 3 secs to sync and turn ON and OFF the lights. With the Smart Bridge the delay is no more than half second. Installation took no more than 5 min!! UPDATE 01/06/2015: This is getting even better. Today Lutron updated the app and added support for Nest Learning Thermostat!! Now you can control your Nest Thermostat from the Caseta app!!!
customer_reviews.author: enricoclaudio

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great instructions on how to pair to Alexa for voice-controlled lighting.

customer_reviews.title: Caseta wireless also controls wireless Honeywell thermostats
customer_reviews.text: No neutral wire required and supports even more devices than I bargained for. I was only expecting it to dim the Versi LED lights in my home theater, but after I had a Mitsubishi ductless mini-split installed to keep the theater cool, I stumbled on to the fact this system also controls the wireless Honeywell thermostat on the mini-split. WOW! What an unexpected surprise that was!
customer_reviews.author: darqman

customer_reviews.title: Great Home Automation Platform
customer_reviews.text: This system works great! A bit pricy, but I have a lot of respect for Lutron due to previous purchases of their electronic switches. This Caseta system gives me the performance that I have grown to expect from Lutron.

customer_reviews.text: Terrible Terrible product - took forever to set up - gets stuck on install step 5 - have do all these troubleshooting gyrations to get it going - finally installed then programed in Pico devices. Lights wouldn't light - bridge lost it connection multiple times - wasted so much time on this product - ready to take a hammer to it - save your $100
customer_reviews.author: Brian M.

customer_reviews.title: A Complete Waste of Money and Time
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money with this. It's really hard to setup, and when you do, the software doesn't work too well. It's way too expensive, you can pickup a WINK hub, that has more features and can control the Lutron stuff for half the price. I was unfortunately past my 30 day window, so I basically ended up with a useless doorstop!
customer_reviews.author: SDF1

customer_reviews.title: You have to be a tinkerer and comfortable with erratic behavior to enjoy this product
customer_reviews.text: This product is way too expensive for how buggy it is. You have to be a tinkerer and comfortable with erratic behavior to enjoy this product. For some unknown reason, this hub requires access to the lutron servers to use the iphone app. When the servers go down, your ability to control the hub via the app goes down. In hind sight, I would have gone with the wink platform and/or looked at smarthings.com. When I have some time off, I'm planning on ripping this stuff out and getting a more reliable system.
customer_reviews.author: MSherman

customer_reviews.title: Control all w/ Alexa just fine.
customer_reviews.text: It just works. I installed it a year ago and it's worked ever since. Here's hoping this review doesn't jinx anything. I've connected 6 lighting and 1 HVAC system thus far. Control all w/ Alexa just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Holland

customer_reviews.title: SERVERS DOWN AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: Lutron Servers are proving to be unreliable. I've purchased the smart bridge pro and about 20 switches and 15 picos. When they work they are great! But in the last 6 days the servers have been down 2 days. Yes the switches and picos will work even when the system is down but all other integration or remote access DO NOT work. No IFTTT, no off from work, no nest integration. HOLD off for now, don't make my mistake and invest over $2000 in a system that isn't ready for market yet.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an electrical contractor and this is so simple to install you don't need a professional to install it. The linking is very easy. I've had it for a few months and I haven't found one single bug. Don't hesitate to buy. It's an excellent system.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.customer

customer_reviews.title: Lighting Automation made Simple
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Lutron Caseta system a month ago. It worked seamlessly out of the box. I had wireless Maestro dimmers with Pico remotes previously. This automated control has really taken my system to next level. The installation was a breeze. I highly recommend it, as the program user interface is top notch and very simple to use. I use it with my iPhone 6. I never walk into a dark apartment. I have also been able to program lights to turn on at certain times, for example when I want to wake up. Anyone who wants full lighting control should consider the Caseta System.
customer_reviews.author: Nrcnyc

product_meta.title: Lutron L-BDG-WH Caseta Wireless Smart Bridge, White
product_meta.description:
LUTRON L-BDG-WH CASETA WIRELESS SMART BRIDGE, WHITE
 MEET THE CASÉTA WIRELESS FAMILY!
Controlling lights has never been easier, more reliable, or affordable with Caséta wireless dimmers and remotes. Offering the ultimate convenience and flexibility, the Caséta Wireless family allows you to adjust your lights and shades from anywhere in the room with Pico remotes or on the go using your smart phone or tablet with the Lutron app and Smart Bridge. Embedded with Lutron’s powerful Clear Connect technology, the Caséta wireless family ensures a reliable, seamless and consistent connected home experience. Take light control to a whole new level with this convenient, energy-saving solution that installs in minutes. Once you make the switch to Caséta Wireless, you’ll wonder how you ever lived without it.

 ON THE GO
Control lights and shades from anywhere in the world – maybe you’re on vacation and want to make your home look lived in, in your bed and forgot to turn off the downstairs lights, or in your driveway and don’t want to enter a dark house. You can even schedule lights and shades to adjust automatically at set times of the day – sunset, sunrise, or when you know your kids will be coming home.

 ADD A PERSONAL TOUCH
Create personalized scenes to control multiple lights and shades at the touch of a button. Dim the lights and close the shades as the movie begins, or set an “entertaining” scene for when you have guests over. Add an additional point of control at the top of the stairs or next to your bed stand by attaching a Pico remote to your wall – no wiring required.


Smart Bridge (Model #: L-BDG-WH)  LUTRON SMART BRIDGE AND APP
Your connected home begins here - control your lights and shades from anywhere with the easy to use Lutron app and Smart Bridge. Embedded with Lutron’s powerful and reliable Clear Connect technology, the Lutron Smart Bridge plugs right into your Wi-Fi router and provides convenient control of Caséta Wireless dimmers and Lutron Serena shades from iOS and Android-based smart phones and tablets.

Caséta In-Wall Dimmer Kit (Model #: P-PK1GW-WH)  CASÉTA WIRELESS IN-WALL DIMMER WITH PICO REMOTE CONTROL KIT
This starter kit includes an in-wall wireless dimmer, coordinating screw less wall plate and Pico remote control that lets you adjust lights from anywhere in the room. The dimmer simply replaces an existing switch, and works with the newest energy efficiency bulbs, including dimmable LED and dimmable CFLs, as well as incandescent and halogen bulbs.

Caséta Plug-In Lamp Dimmer Kit (Model #: P-PK1GP-WH)  CASÉTA WIRELESS PLUG-IN LAMP DIMMER WITH PICO REMOTE CONTROL KIT
Conveniently create just the right with this no-wiring required starter kit. The plug-in lamp dimmer simply plugs into a standard outlet, can be used with up to two lamps, and works with dimmable LEDs and CFLs, as well as incandescent or halogen bulbs. The kit also includes a Pico remote control to conveniently turn lights on/off as well as brighten or dim them.

Caséta Plug-In Dimmer & In-Wall Dimmer (Model #'s: P-PK1GP-WH, P-PK1GW-WH)  CASÉTA WIRELESS IN-WALL DIMMER AND PLUG-IN DIMMER
Add additional in-wall and plug-in dimmers to your home by purchasing Caséta Wireless stand-alone dimmers. Compatible with dimmable LEDs and CFLs, as well as halogen and incandescent bulbs, these wireless dimmers give you the ability to set the right light for any activity. You can conveniently control several Caséta wireless dimmers with a single Pico remote control (sold separately) or purchase additional Pico remotes for independent control of each dimmer.

Pico Remote Control (Model #: PJ2-3BRL-WH-L01, PJ2-2BRL-GLA-L01R, PJ2-2B-GBL-L01)  PICO REMOTE CONTROL
This handy wireless remote controls Caséta in-wall or plug in dimmers, and boasts a 10-year battery life. You can turn lights on, off, raise or lower them from anywhere in the room as well as set and save your preferred light level with a "favorite" button. The Pico can replace an existing 3-way switch when paired with a Caséta Wireless dimmer, as well as attach anywhere on a wall with a screw less wall plate to add an additional point of control. Available in a variety of versions and colors, you can also use the Pico as a handheld remote, mount it on a tabletop pedestal or attach to a car visor clip.

Pico Remote Tabletop Pedestal in White (Model #: L-PED1-WH)  ACCESSORIES
Coordinate your Caséta Wireless lighting controls with accessories that add versatility and complement your décor – ensure you never misplace your Pico remote by pairing it with a tabletop pedestal. Turn on your lights from the safety of your car as you arrive home with the Pico Car Clip. Attach your Pico remote to the wall for an additional point of control with a coordinating wall plate. Caséta Wireless accessories are available in a variety of colors, allowing you to beautifully customize the look of each room in your home.

Schedule daily events and create scenes

Adjust Nest and selected Honeywell Wi-Fi thermostats using the Lutron App
Enables control of Caséta Wireless Dimmers and Serena shades from your Harmony Home Control remote
Connect with your lights, shades and more right from your wrist through the Lutron app on the Apple WatchTM wearable
Geofencing feature triggers events when you are within a preset radius of your home, like turning on your lights or sending a notification if you've left the lights on
